metadataAttributes.Title: An Introduction to Programming the Internet of Things (IOT) Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Create Your Own Internet of Things (IoT) Device. Design and create a simple IoT device in just six courses.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Arduino, Python Programming, Internet Of Things (IOT), Raspberry Pi, Microcontroller, Embedded System Design, Wireshark, C Programming, Debugging, Computer Programming, Application Programming Interfaces (API),
